question:
[Kenneth] and his wife [Michele] went to the beach to watch the fireworks on the 4th of July. [Charlie] bought gifts for his lovely sister, [Jami] [Jami] and her aunt, [Judy], went to the deli. They got a half a pound of corned beef, and two pounds of salami. [Joseph] took his son [Lawrence] to the junkyard. [Joseph]'s son [Gerald] did n't go because he thought is was a gross place. [Joseph] dropped his son [Gerald] off at a friend's house for the night, as he was taking his wife [Judy] out to dinner. [Charlie] took his son [Kenneth] out for pizza. [William] asked his uncle, [Lawrence], to pick him up. [Lawrence] told him he was too heavy.
Question: How is [William] related to [Michele]?
